00033 DiagramInterconnection::DiagramInterconnection(
00034         DiagramConnectionEndPoint *endPoint1,
00035         DiagramConnectionEndPoint *endPoint2,
00036         bool autoConnect,
00037         const QString &displayName,
00038         const QString &description,
00039                 QGraphicsItem *parent):
00040 QGraphicsPathItem(parent), 
00041 name_(), 
00042 description_(description),
00043 endPoint1_(0),
00044 endPoint2_(0), 
00045 pathPoints_(), 
00046 selected_(-1), 
00047 selectionType_(NONE)
00048 {
00049     setItemSettings();
00050     createRoute(endPoint1, endPoint2);
00051 
00052     if (autoConnect)
00053     {
00054         endPoint1_ = endPoint1;
00055         endPoint2_ = endPoint2;
00056 
00057         endPoint1->addInterconnection(this);
00058         endPoint2->addInterconnection(this);
00059         updateName();
00060     }
00061 }

00090 bool DiagramInterconnection::connectEnds()
00091 {
00092     if (!scene())
00093         return false;
00094 
00095     prepareGeometryChange();
00096 
00097     // Disconnect the previous ends.
00098     disconnectEnds();
00099     
00100     // Find the new end points.
00101     endPoint1_ = DiagramUtil::snapToItem<DiagramConnectionEndPoint>(pathPoints_.first(), scene(), GridSize);
00102     Q_ASSERT(endPoint1_ != 0);
00103     
00104     endPoint2_ = DiagramUtil::snapToItem<DiagramConnectionEndPoint>(pathPoints_.last(), scene(), GridSize);
00105     Q_ASSERT(endPoint2_ != 0);
00106 
00107     // Swap the end points in a way that the first one at least has an encompassing component.
00108     if (endPoint1_->encompassingComp() == 0)
00109     {
00110         std::swap(endPoint1_, endPoint2_);
00111         
00112         // The path points have to be reversed.
00113         for (int i = 0; i < pathPoints_.size() / 2; ++i)
00114         {
00115             pathPoints_.swap(i, pathPoints_.size() - 1 - i);
00116         }
00117     }
00118     
00119     // Make the connections and check for errors.
00120     if (!endPoint1_->onConnect(endPoint2_))
00121     {
00122         endPoint1_ = 0;
00123         return false;
00124     }
00125     
00126     if (!endPoint2_->onConnect(endPoint1_))
00127     {
00128         endPoint1_->onDisconnect(endPoint2_);
00129         endPoint1_ = 0;
00130         endPoint2_ = 0;
00131         return false;
00132     }
00133 
00134     endPoint1_->addInterconnection(this);
00135     endPoint2_->addInterconnection(this);
00136 
00137     // Check if both end points were found.
00138     if (endPoint1_ && endPoint2_) {
00139         simplifyPath();
00140         setRoute(pathPoints_);
00141         updateName();
00142         return true;
00143     }
00144 
00145     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, scene()->items(pathPoints_.first())) {
00146         if (item == this)
00147             continue;
00148 
00149         if (item->type() == DiagramInterconnection::Type) {
00150             DiagramInterconnection *segment
00151                     = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramInterconnection *>(item);
00152 
00153             if (segment->route().last() == pathPoints_.first()) {
00154                 QList<QPointF> newPath = segment->route();
00155                 newPath.append(pathPoints_);
00156                 pathPoints_ = newPath;
00157                 scene()->removeItem(segment);
00158                 delete segment;
00159 
00160                 return connectEnds();
00161             } else if (segment->route().first() == pathPoints_.first()) {
00162                 QList<QPointF> newPath = segment->route();
00163                 for(int i = 0; i < (newPath.size()/2); i++)
00164                     newPath.swap(i, newPath.size()-(1+i));
00165                 newPath.append(pathPoints_);
00166                 pathPoints_ = newPath;
00167                 scene()->removeItem(segment);
00168                 delete segment;
00169 
00170                 return connectEnds();
00171             }
00172         }
00173     }
00174 
00175     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, scene()->items(pathPoints_.last())) {
00176         if (item == this)
00177             continue;
00178 
00179         if (item->type() == DiagramInterconnection::Type) {
00180             DiagramInterconnection *segment
00181                     = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramInterconnection *>(item);
00182 
00183             if (segment->route().first() == pathPoints_.last()) {
00184                 pathPoints_.append(segment->route());
00185                 scene()->removeItem(segment);
00186                 delete segment;
00187 
00188                 return connectEnds();
00189             } else if (segment->route().last() == pathPoints_.last()) {
00190                 QList<QPointF> newPath = segment->route();
00191                 for(int i = 0; i < (newPath.size()/2); i++)
00192                     newPath.swap(i, newPath.size()-(1+i));
00193                 pathPoints_.append(newPath);
00194                 scene()->removeItem(segment);
00195                 delete segment;
00196 
00197                 return connectEnds();
00198             }
00199         }
00200     }
00201 
00202     simplifyPath();
00203     setRoute(pathPoints_);
00204     updateName();
00205     return true;
00206 }
00207 
00208 void DiagramInterconnection::setRoute(QList<QPointF> path)
00209 {
00210     if (path.size() < 2)
00211         return;
00212 
00213     if (endPoint1_)
00214     {
00215         QVector2D dir = QVector2D(path[1] - path[0]).normalized();
00216 
00217         // Switch the direction of the end point if it is not correct.
00218         if (!endPoint1_->isDirectionFixed() && QVector2D::dotProduct(dir, endPoint1_->getDirection()) < 0)
00219         {
00220             endPoint1_->setDirection(dir);
00221         }
00222     }
00223 
00224     if (endPoint2_)
00225     {
00226         QVector2D dir = QVector2D(path[path.size() - 2] - path[path.size() - 1]).normalized();
00227 
00228         // Switch the direction of the end point if it is not correct.
00229         if (!endPoint2_->isDirectionFixed() && QVector2D::dotProduct(dir, endPoint2_->getDirection()) < 0)
00230         {
00231             endPoint2_->setDirection(dir);
00232         }
00233     }
00234 
00235     QListIterator<QPointF> i(path);
00236 
00237     QPainterPath painterPath(i.next());
00238 
00239     while (i.hasNext()) {
00240         painterPath.lineTo(i.next());
00241     }
00242 
00243     QPainterPathStroker stroker;
00244     setPath(stroker.createStroke(painterPath));
00245 
00246     if (path != pathPoints_)
00247     {
00248         pathPoints_ = path;
00249         emit contentChanged();
00250     }
00251 }

00279     return endPoint2_;

00281 
00282 void DiagramInterconnection::updatePosition()
00283 {
00284     QVector2D delta1 = QVector2D(endPoint1_->scenePos()) - QVector2D(pathPoints_.first());
00285     QVector2D delta2 = QVector2D(endPoint2_->scenePos()) - QVector2D(pathPoints_.last());
00286     QVector2D const& dir1 = endPoint1_->getDirection();
00287     QVector2D const& dir2 = endPoint2_->getDirection();
00288 
00289     // Recreate the route from scratch if there are not enough points in the path or
00290     // the route is too complicated when the position and direction of the endpoints is considered.
00291     if (pathPoints_.size() < 2 ||
00292         (pathPoints_.size() > 4 && qFuzzyCompare(QVector2D::dotProduct(dir1, dir2), -1.0) &&
00293         QVector2D::dotProduct(dir1, QVector2D(endPoint2_->scenePos() - endPoint1_->scenePos())) > 0.0))
00294     {
00295         createRoute(endPoint1_, endPoint2_);
00296         return;
00297     }
00298 
00299     // If the delta movement of both endpoints was the same, we can just
00300     // move all route points by the delta1.
00301     if (qFuzzyCompare(delta1, delta2))
00302     {
00303         if (!delta1.isNull())
00304         {
00305             for (int i = 0; i < pathPoints_.size(); ++i)
00306             {
00307                 pathPoints_[i] += delta1.toPointF();
00308             }
00309 
00310             setRoute(pathPoints_);
00311         }
00312     }
00313     // Otherwise check if either the first or the last point was moved.
00314     else if (!delta1.isNull() || !delta2.isNull())
00315     {
00316         bool pathOk = false;
00317         QVector2D delta = delta1;
00318         QVector2D dir = dir1;
00319         DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint = endPoint1_;
00320         int index0 = 0;
00321         int index1 = 1;
00322         int index2 = 2;
00323         int index3 = 3;
00324 
00325         if (!delta2.isNull())
00326         {
00327             delta = delta2;
00328             endPoint = endPoint2_;
00329             dir = dir2;
00330             index0 = pathPoints_.size() - 1;
00331             index1 = pathPoints_.size() - 2;
00332             index2 = pathPoints_.size() - 3;
00333             index3 = pathPoints_.size() - 4;
00334         }
00335 
00336         QVector2D seg1 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[index1] - pathPoints_[index0]).normalized();
00337 
00338         // Try to fix the first segment with perpendicular projection.
00339         if (pathPoints_.size() >= 4 && pathPoints_.size() < 7 && qFuzzyCompare(dir, seg1))
00340         {
00341             QVector2D perp = delta - QVector2D::dotProduct(delta, seg1) * seg1;
00342             pathPoints_[index1] += perp.toPointF();
00343 
00344             // The path is ok if the moved point is still in view (not behind the left edge).
00345             pathOk = pathPoints_[index1].x() >= 10.0;
00346         }
00347 
00348         // Handle the parallel part of the delta.
00349         pathPoints_[index0] = endPoint->scenePos();
00350         QVector2D newSeg1 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[index1] - pathPoints_[index0]);
00351         
00352         if (newSeg1.length() < MIN_LENGTH || !qFuzzyCompare(seg1, newSeg1.normalized()))
00353         {
00354             pathOk = false;
00355         }
00356 
00357         // Check for a special case when there would be intersecting parallel lines.
00358         if (pathOk && pathPoints_.size() >= 4)
00359         {
00360             QVector2D seg2 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[index2] - pathPoints_[index1]).normalized();
00361             QVector2D seg3 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[index3] - pathPoints_[index2]).normalized();
00362 
00363             if (QVector2D::dotProduct(seg1, seg2) < 0.0f ||
00364                 (seg2.isNull() && QVector2D::dotProduct(seg1, seg3) < 0.0f))
00365             {
00366                 pathOk = false;
00367             }
00368         }
00369 
00370         // Snap the middle path points to grid.
00371         for (int i = 1; i < pathPoints_.size() - 1; ++i)
00372         {
00373             pathPoints_[i] = snapPointToGrid(pathPoints_[i]);
00374         }
00375 
00376         // If the simple fix didn't result in a solution, just recreate the route.
00377         if (!pathOk)
00378         {
00379             createRoute(endPoint1_, endPoint2_);
00380         }
00381         else
00382         {
00383             //simplifyPath();
00384             setRoute(pathPoints_);
00385         }
00386     }
00387 
00388     emit contentChanged();
00389 }
00390 
00391 const QList<QPointF> &DiagramInterconnection::route()
00392 {
00393     return pathPoints_;
00394 }
00395 
00396 void DiagramInterconnection::simplifyPath()
00397 {
00398     if (pathPoints_.size() < 3)
00399         return;
00400 
00401     for (int i = 0; i < pathPoints_.size() - 2; ++i)
00402     {
00403         QVector2D pt0 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[i]);
00404         QVector2D pt1 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[i + 1]);
00405         QVector2D pt2 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[i + 2]);
00406 
00407         QVector2D delta1 = pt1 - pt0;
00408         QVector2D delta2 = pt2 - pt1;
00409 
00410         QVector2D deltaProj = QVector2D::dotProduct(delta2, delta1.normalized()) * delta1.normalized();
00411 
00412         // If the path was otherwise ok, just remove parallel lines.
00413         if (qFuzzyCompare(deltaProj, delta2))
00414         {
00415             pathPoints_.removeAt(i + 1);
00416             --i;
00417         }                                
00418     }
00419 
00420     selected_ = -1;
00421     selectionType_ = NONE;
00422 }
00423 
00424 void DiagramInterconnection::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00425 {
00426     QPointF pos = snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->pos());
00427 
00428     oldRoute_ = route();
00429 
00430     if (pathPoints_.first() == pos) {
00431         selectionType_ = END;
00432         selected_ = 0;
00433     } else if (pathPoints_.last() == pos) {
00434         selectionType_ = END;
00435         selected_ = pathPoints_.size()-1;
00436     } else if (pathPoints_.size() > 1) {
00437         for (int i = 0; i < pathPoints_.size()-1; i++) {
00438             if ((i == 0 && endPoint1_) || (i == pathPoints_.size()-2 && endPoint2_))
00439                 continue;
00440             if ((qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[i].x(), pos.x())
00441                 && qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[i+1].x(), pos.x()))
00442                 || (qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[i].y(), pos.y())
00443                     && qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[i+1].y(), pos.y()))) {
00444                 selected_ = i;
00445                 selectionType_ = SEGMENT;
00446             }
00447         }
00448     } else {
00449         selected_ = -1;
00450         selectionType_ = NONE;
00451     }
00452 
00453     QGraphicsPathItem::mousePressEvent(mouseEvent);
00454 }
00455 
00456 void DiagramInterconnection::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00457 {
00458     // Discard mouse move if the diagram is protected.
00459     if (static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(scene())->isProtected())
00460     {
00461         return;
00462     }
00463 
00464     QPointF newPos = snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->pos());
00465 
00466     if (selectionType_ == END)
00467     {
00468         // Disconnect the ends.
00469         disconnectEnds();
00470 
00471         if (pathPoints_.size() > 2) {
00472             if (selected_ == pathPoints_.size()-1) {
00473                 if (qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[selected_-1].x(), pathPoints_[selected_-2].x())) {
00474                     pathPoints_[selected_-1].setY(newPos.y());
00475                 } else {
00476                     pathPoints_[selected_-1].setX(newPos.x());
00477                 }
00478             } else if (selected_ == 0) {
00479                 if (qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[selected_+1].x(), pathPoints_[selected_+2].x())) {
00480                     pathPoints_[selected_+1].setY(newPos.y());
00481                 } else {
00482                     pathPoints_[selected_+1].setX(newPos.x());
00483                 }
00484             }
00485             pathPoints_[selected_] = newPos;
00486             setRoute(pathPoints_);
00487         } else {
00488             QPointF oldPos = pathPoints_[selected_];
00489 
00490             if (qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_.first().x(), pathPoints_.last().x())) {
00491                 pathPoints_[selected_].setY(newPos.y());
00492             } else {
00493                 pathPoints_[selected_].setX(newPos.x());
00494             }
00495             if (pathPoints_.first() == pathPoints_.last())
00496                 pathPoints_[selected_] = oldPos;
00497             else
00498                 setRoute(pathPoints_);
00499         }
00500 
00501         emit contentChanged();
00502     }
00503     else if (selectionType_ == SEGMENT)
00504     {
00505         if (qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[selected_].x(), pathPoints_[selected_+1].x()))
00506         {
00507             // Clamp the movement delta.
00508             qreal delta = newPos.x() - pathPoints_[selected_].x();
00509             qreal prev = pathPoints_[selected_ - 1].x();
00510             qreal cur = pathPoints_[selected_].x();
00511             qreal next = pathPoints_[selected_ + 2].x();
00512 
00513             if (cur > next)
00514             {
00515                 delta = std::max(delta, 10 + next - cur);
00516             }
00517             else
00518             {
00519                 delta = std::min(delta, -10 + next - cur);
00520             }
00521 
00522             if (cur > prev)
00523             {
00524                 delta = std::max(delta, 10 + prev - cur);
00525             }
00526             else
00527             {
00528                 delta = std::min(delta, -10 + prev - cur);
00529             }
00530 
00531             pathPoints_[selected_].setX(pathPoints_[selected_].x() + delta);
00532             pathPoints_[selected_+1].setX(pathPoints_[selected_+1].x() + delta);
00533         }
00534         else if (qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[selected_].y(), pathPoints_[selected_+1].y()))
00535         {
00536             qreal prev = pathPoints_[selected_ - 1].y();
00537             qreal next = pathPoints_[selected_ + 2].y();
00538 
00539             // Change the route only if the next and previous segments would not be too short.
00540             if (abs(newPos.y() - prev) >= MIN_LENGTH && abs(newPos.y() - next) >= MIN_LENGTH)
00541             {
00542                 pathPoints_[selected_].setY(newPos.y());
00543                 pathPoints_[selected_+1].setY(newPos.y());
00544             }
00545         }
00546 
00547         setRoute(pathPoints_);
00548         emit contentChanged();
00549     }
00550 
00551     QGraphicsPathItem::mouseMoveEvent(mouseEvent);
00552 }
00553 
00554 void DiagramInterconnection::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00555 {
00556     if (selectionType_ == END)
00557     {
00558         DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint1 =
00559             DiagramUtil::snapToItem<DiagramConnectionEndPoint>(pathPoints_.first(), scene(), GridSize);
00560         DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint2 =
00561             DiagramUtil::snapToItem<DiagramConnectionEndPoint>(pathPoints_.last(), scene(), GridSize);
00562 
00563         if (endPoint1 != 0 && endPoint2 != 0 &&
00564             endPoint1->canConnect(endPoint2) && endPoint2->canConnect(endPoint1))
00565         {
00566             connectEnds();
00567         }
00568     }
00569     else if (selectionType_ == SEGMENT)
00570     {
00571         simplifyPath();
00572         setRoute(pathPoints_);
00573     }
00574 
00575     if (route() != oldRoute_)
00576     {
00577         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new ConnectionMoveCommand(this, oldRoute_));
00578         static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00579     }
00580 
00581     QGraphicsPathItem::mouseReleaseEvent(mouseEvent);
00582 }

00584 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00585 // Function: paint()
00586 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00587 void DiagramInterconnection::paint(QPainter *painter,
00588                                    const QStyleOptionGraphicsItem *option,
00589                                    QWidget *widget)
00590 {
00591     QStyleOptionGraphicsItem myoption = (*option);
00592     myoption.state &= !QStyle::State_Selected;
00593 
00594     QGraphicsPathItem::paint(painter, &myoption, widget);
00595 
00596     if (!endPoint1_)
00597         painter->fillRect(QRectF(pathPoints_.first()-QPointF(2,2),
00598                                  pathPoints_.first()+QPointF(2,2)),
00599                           QBrush(Qt::red));
00600 
00601     if (!endPoint2_)
00602         painter->fillRect(QRectF(pathPoints_.last()-QPointF(2,2),
00603                                  pathPoints_.last()+QPointF(2,2)),
00604                           QBrush(Qt::red));
00605 }

00607 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00608 // Function: setItemSettings()
00609 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00610 void DiagramInterconnection::setItemSettings()
00611 {
00612     setZValue(-1000);
00613     QPen newPen = pen();
00614     newPen.setWidth(3);
00615     setPen(newPen);
00616 
00617     setFlag(ItemIsSelectable);
00618 }

00620 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00621 // Function: createRoute()
00622 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00623 void DiagramInterconnection::createRoute(DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint1,
00624                                          DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint2)
00625 {
00626     Q_ASSERT(endPoint1 != 0);
00627     Q_ASSERT(endPoint2 != 0);
00628     
00629     QPointF p1 = endPoint1->scenePos();
00630     QPointF p2 = endPoint2->scenePos();
00631     
00632     if (!endPoint1->isDirectionFixed())
00633     {
00634         if (p1.x() <= p2.x())
00635         {
00636             endPoint1->setDirection(QVector2D(1.0f, 0.0f));
00637         }
00638         else
00639         {
00640             endPoint1->setDirection(QVector2D(-1.0f, 0.0f));
00641         }
00642     }
00643 
00644     if (!endPoint2->isDirectionFixed())
00645     {
00646         if (p1.x() <= p2.x())
00647         {
00648             endPoint2->setDirection(QVector2D(-1.0f, 0.0f));
00649         }
00650         else
00651         {
00652             endPoint2->setDirection(QVector2D(1.0f, 0.0f));
00653         }
00654     }
00655 
00656     createRoute(p1, p2, endPoint1->getDirection(), endPoint2->getDirection());
00657 }
00658 
00659 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00660 // Function: createRoute()
00661 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00662 void DiagramInterconnection::createRoute(QPointF p1, QPointF p2,
00663                                          QVector2D const& dir1, QVector2D const& dir2)
00664 {
00665     pathPoints_.clear();
00666 
00667     // Convert the points to vectors.
00668     QVector2D startPos = QVector2D(p1);
00669     QVector2D endPos = QVector2D(p2);
00670 
00671     // Sets the start position as the current position.
00672     QVector2D curPos = startPos;
00673     QVector2D curDir = dir1;
00674 
00675     // Set the target position based on the end point's direction.
00676     QVector2D targetPos = QVector2D(p2) + dir2 * MIN_LENGTH;
00677 
00678     // Add the start position to the painter path.
00679     QPainterPath path(curPos.toPointF());
00680     pathPoints_ << curPos.toPointF();
00681 
00682     if (startPos != endPos)
00683     {
00684         // Find a route to the target.
00685         while (curPos != targetPos)
00686         {
00687             // Calculate the delta.
00688             QVector2D delta = targetPos - curPos;
00689             qreal dot = QVector2D::dotProduct(delta, curDir);
00690             qreal endDot = QVector2D::dotProduct(delta, dir2);
00691 
00692             // Calculate the projection onto the current direction and the perpendicular part.
00693             QVector2D proj = dot * curDir;
00694             QVector2D perp = delta - proj;
00695 
00696             // Check if we can draw a direct line to the target from the current position.
00697             if (dot > 0.0 && qFuzzyCompare(delta, proj) && endDot <= 0.0)
00698             {
00699                 curPos = targetPos;
00700             }
00701             else 
00702             {
00703                 // Otherwise draw at least some distance to the current direction.
00704                 // Check if the target is not behind the current position/direction.
00705                 if (qFuzzyCompare(curPos, startPos))
00706                 {
00707                     if (dot > 0.0 && !(endDot > 0.0 && qFuzzyCompare(delta, endDot * dir2)))
00708                     {
00709                         // Draw the length of the projection to the current direction
00710                         // or at least the minimum length.
00711                         curPos = curPos + curDir * std::max(MIN_LENGTH, proj.length());
00712                     }
00713                     else
00714                     {
00715                         // Otherwise we just draw the minimum length thub.
00716                         curPos = curPos + curDir * MIN_LENGTH;
00717                     }
00718                 }
00719                 // Check if the target is in the opposite direction compared to the current
00720                 // direction and we previously draw the starting thub.
00721                 else if (dot < 0 && qFuzzyCompare(curPos, startPos + curDir * MIN_LENGTH))
00722                 {
00723                     // Draw to the perpendicular direction at least the minimum length.
00724                     qreal length = std::max(perp.length(), MIN_LENGTH);
00725                     QVector2D dir = perp.normalized();
00726 
00727                     // Special case when the perpendicular vector would be zero-length.
00728                     if (dir.isNull())
00729                     {
00730                         // Rotate 90 degrees.
00731                         dir = QVector2D(curDir.y(), -curDir.x());
00732                     }
00733 
00734                     curPos = curPos + dir * length;
00735                     curDir = dir;
00736                 }
00737                 else
00738                 {
00739                     // Otherwise we just draw to the perpendicular direction as much as we can.
00740                     if (!perp.isNull())
00741                     {
00742                         curPos = curPos + perp;
00743                         curDir = perp.normalized();
00744                     }
00745                     else
00746                     {
00747                         // If the perpendicular vector was zero-length, we rotate the current
00748                         // direction 90 degrees and draw a minimum length thub to the new direction.
00749                         curDir = QVector2D(curDir.y(), -curDir.x());
00750                         curPos = curPos + curDir * MIN_LENGTH;
00751                     }
00752                 }
00753 
00754                 // Check if we would end up in a position where we are right behind the target.
00755                 QVector2D newDelta = targetPos - curPos;
00756                 qreal endDot = QVector2D::dotProduct(newDelta, dir2);
00757 
00758                 if (endDot > 0.0 && qFuzzyCompare(newDelta, endDot * dir2))
00759                 {
00760                     // Make an adjustment to the current position.
00761                     curPos += curDir * MIN_LENGTH;
00762                 }
00763             }
00764 
00765             // Add the newly calculated current position to the path.
00766             path.lineTo(curPos.toPointF());
00767             pathPoints_ << curPos.toPointF();
00768         }
00769 
00770         // Add the last segment if the target position was not the end position.
00771         if (!qFuzzyCompare(targetPos, endPos))
00772         {
00773             path.lineTo(endPos.toPointF());
00774             pathPoints_ << endPos.toPointF();
00775         }
00776     }
00777 
00778     simplifyPath();
00779 
00780     QPainterPathStroker stroker;
00781     setPath(stroker.createStroke(path));
00782 }
00783 
00784 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00785 // Function: updateName()
00786 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00787 void DiagramInterconnection::updateName()
00788 {
00789     Q_ASSERT(endPoint1_ != 0);
00790     Q_ASSERT(endPoint2_ != 0);
00791 
00792     // Determine one of the end points as the starting point in a way that its
00793     // encompassing component is defined.
00794     DiagramConnectionEndPoint* start = endPoint1_;
00795     DiagramConnectionEndPoint* end = endPoint2_;
00796 
00797     if (start->encompassingComp() == 0)
00798     {
00799         std::swap(start, end);
00800         Q_ASSERT(start->encompassingComp() != 0);
00801     }
00802 
00803     // Update the name string.
00804     QString endCompName = "";
00805     
00806     if (end->encompassingComp() != 0)
00807     {
00808         endCompName = end->encompassingComp()->name() + "_";
00809     }
00810 
00811     // TODO: Problems?
00812     if (start->getBusInterface() != 0 && end->getBusInterface() != 0)
00813     {
00814         name_ = start->encompassingComp()->name() + "_" + start->getBusInterface()->getName() + "_to_" +
00815                 endCompName + end->getBusInterface()->getName();
00816     }
00817     else
00818     {
00819     }
00820 }
00821 
00822 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00823 // Function: disconnectEnds()
00824 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00825 void DiagramInterconnection::disconnectEnds()
00826 {
00827     // Discard existing connections.
00828     if (endPoint1_)
00829     {
00830         endPoint1_->removeInterconnection(this);
00831         endPoint1_->onDisconnect(endPoint2_);
00832     }
00833 
00834     if (endPoint2_)
00835     {
00836         endPoint2_->removeInterconnection(this);
00837         endPoint2_->onDisconnect(endPoint1_);
00838     }
00839 
00840     emit contentChanged();
00841     endPoint1_ = 0;
00842     endPoint2_ = 0;
00843 }
00844 
00845 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00846 // Function: itemChange()
00847 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00848 QVariant DiagramInterconnection::itemChange(GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant &value)
00849 {
00850     switch (change)
00851     {
00852     case ItemSelectedHasChanged:
00853         {
00854             bool selected = value.toBool();
00855             
00856             QPen curPen = pen();
00857 
00858             if (selected)
00859             {
00860                 curPen.setColor(Qt::red);
00861             }
00862             else
00863             {
00864                 curPen.setColor(Qt::black);
00865             }
00866 
00867             setPen(curPen);
00868             return value;
00869         }
00870     }
00871 
00872     return QGraphicsPathItem::itemChange(change, value);
00873 }
00874 
00875 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00876 // Function: beginUpdatePosition()
00877 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00878 void DiagramInterconnection::beginUpdatePosition()
00879 {
00880     oldRoute_ = route();
00881 }
00882 
00883 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00884 // Function: endUpdatePosition()
00885 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00886 QUndoCommand* DiagramInterconnection::endUpdatePosition(QUndoCommand* parent)
00887 {
00888     if (route() != oldRoute_)
00889     {
00890         return new ConnectionMoveCommand(this, oldRoute_, parent);
00891     }
00892     else
00893     {
00894         return 0;
00895     }
00896 }
